label: 北白川殿
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Presumably in Kitashirakawa, a rural area northeast of the capital. Thought to have been a residence of Ankamon-in, surrogate mother (hahashiro) of Emperor Kameyama. Burial site of Emperor Go-Nijō. [安嘉門院　亀山天皇　後二条]
